lesson.title: Creating the manager and a database
lesson.description: Create a manager and a database for CouchbaseEvents

introduction.paragraph: Every Couchbase Lite application needs a manager object, which manages access to databases. This section shows you how to create the manager and a database.
A best practice here is to actually make the CBLManager and CBLDatabase references available to the rest of your iOS app as shared instances.

body.paragraph: Now we are ready. We are going to create a system that allows the user to make events (such as a party, or a seminar), and update them, etc.
